name: GOG RTS Bundle
description:
Hurry up! This is a limited offer! Only 2000 copies are available!


GOG Bundle brings you exciting games for a great price!
Titles included in the bundle: Empires: Dawn of the Modern World - From Middle Ages through World War II, Command battles with an amazing array of historic troops and abilities - over land, sea, and air. Lead 7 civilizations; fight 3 campaigns; conquer epic maps in historical battles throughout history. Massive time line and variety of fighting units and unique civilizations across five ages: Middle Ages, Gunpowder, Imperial, World War I, World War II. Knights and Merchants: The Peasants Rebellion - recreates the era of the Middle Ages. Apart from the purely fictitious geography of our world, all game elements and scenes are based on the Anglo-Saxon period, 1200 A.D. The player takes on the role of an ordinary captain in the Palace Guard. A conspiracy against the king catapults the captain into a situation where he finds himself responsible for the defence of the last royal province.

In-game features, languages and system requirements may vary between titles.
Please check particular game cards for more precise information.
